1 #include "pcl_crop/pcl_crop.h"
2 
3 #include <sensor_msgs/point_cloud2_iterator.h>

5 namespace pcl_crop {
6 
7 PclCrop::PclCrop(ros::NodeHandle &nh, ros::NodeHandle &nh_private) {
8  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue crops;
9  nh_private.getParam("crops", crops);
10  ROS_ASSERT(crops.getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeArray);
11  for (int i = 0; i < crops.size(); i++) {
12  Crop c;
13  if (crops[i].hasMember("xmin")) {
14  c.xmin = crops[i]["xmin"];
15  }
16  if (crops[i].hasMember("xmax")) {
17  c.xmax = crops[i]["xmax"];
18  }
19  if (crops[i].hasMember("ymin")) {
20  c.ymin = crops[i]["ymin"];
21  }
22  if (crops[i].hasMember("ymax")) {
23  c.ymax = crops[i]["ymax"];
24  }
25  if (crops[i].hasMember("interior")) {
26  c.interior = crops[i]["interior"];
27  }
28  crops_.push_back(c);
29  }
30 
31  publisher_ = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("cropped", 1);
32  subscriber_ = nh.subscribe("image", 1, &PclCrop::callback, this);
33 }
34 
35 void PclCrop::callback(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2::ConstPtr &msg) {
36  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 points;
37  points.header = msg->header;
38  points.is_dense = true;
39  points.is_bigendian = false;
40  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Modifier pcd_modifier(points);
41  pcd_modifier.setPointCloud2FieldsByString(1, "xyz");
42  pcd_modifier.resize(msg->width * msg->height);
43 
44  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<float> iter_x(points, "x");
45  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<float> iter_y(points, "y");
46  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<float> iter_z(points, "z");
47 
48  int i = 0;
49  int valid_points = 0;
50  for (sensor_msgs::PointCloud2ConstIterator<float> it(*msg, "x");
51  it != it.end(); ++it, ++i) {
52  double x = (i % msg->width + 0.5) / msg->width;
53  double y = (i / msg->width + 0.5) / msg->height;
54  for (auto const &crop : crops_) {
55  if (!crop.validate(x, y)) {
56  goto skip_point;
57  }
58  }
59 
60  *iter_x = it[0];
61  *iter_y = it[1];
62  *iter_z = it[2];
63 
64  ++iter_x;
65  ++iter_y;
66  ++iter_z;
67 
68  valid_points++;
69 
70  skip_point:;
71  }
72 
73  points.height = 1;
74  points.width = valid_points;
75  pcd_modifier.resize(valid_points);
76 
77  publisher_.publish(points);
78 }
79 
80 bool Crop::validate(double x, double y) const {
81  return interior != (x >= xmin && x <= xmax && y >= ymin && y <= ymax);
82 }
83
